title: Rebuilding the Wall
summary: The chapter details the groups and individuals who worked on various parts of Jerusalem’s wall. Each family and section is noted, showing unity and shared responsibility in rebuilding God’s city.

faq.question: Who helped rebuild the wall?
faq.answer: Various families, priests, and leaders all worked together on different sections.

faq.question: Why is this chapter significant?
faq.answer: It shows how every person had a role in God’s work, promoting unity and dedication.
